review: I like this a lot. Just wish that it could be controlled by Amazon Echo. There are times when it acts funny and videos just stop at 2 seconds and the main menu opens. This happens several times in a row then eventually stops. I don't know what the cause is and it is not very common, but can be annoying. I like that when searching for a video that Hulu is included in the results as well as Amazon offerings. That is nice. Video quality is very good too. I still have chromecast for google play videos, ultraviolet, and casting of my laptop screen. Thankfully I have enough HDMI ports.
author: Jim Raynor "Vaio CW guy"

review: This device relegates Chromecast to the dust bin of history.  You no longer need to run TV apps through your phone.  People can access a TON of TV shows, movies, music, etc. directly from the stick.  You can take your phone with you while folks at your home can watch TV.  Also, with the stick, there is virtually no reason to continue to spend $75/mo on satellite or cable TV.  I love the stick!!!!!!!!
